body_text:
Analyzing some crash pings for a pref-flip I discovered a subset of clients with pings for both branches of the study that seem to alternate haphazardly over time (rather than changing once over time)
CTRL+F for weirdos.take(weirdos.count()) to see at the following gist
https://gist.github.com/jtg567/6c288bc8ded498ffdd673aec3df1ff45
body_html:
Analyzing some crash pings for a pref-flip I discovered a subset of clients with pings for both branches of the study that seem to alternate haphazardly over time (rather than changing once over time)

CTRL+F for weirdos.take(weirdos.count()) to see at the following gist
https://gist.github.com/jtg567/6c288bc8ded498ffdd673aec3df1ff45
title: Possible that clients are changing branches?
body:
Analyzing some crash pings for a pref-flip I discovered a subset of clients with pings for both branches of the study that seem to alternate haphazardly over time (rather than changing once over time) 

CTRL+F for `weirdos.take(weirdos.count())` to see at the following gist
https://gist.github.com/jtg567/6c288bc8ded498ffdd673aec3df1ff45
